name: A Quick Death
effect:
May only be played by a rogue in another player's formation.
React: After this character wounds a spent character with a melee strike: Kill the target of the strike.
"The Deverenians found the bodies of several Free Kingdoms soldiers, each slain where they stood." - The Loremaster

name: Abd al-Hakiim
effect:
Deverenian • Astral • Stealth +3
Isadran
Spend Order: Target an item in an adjacent rank and perform a Stealth check (DC = 15 + level of the item). If successful, discard the item.

name: Abd al-Rahiim
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist
Astral • Isadran
Spend React: After a Deverenian in this rank is targeted with an action or melee strike: Redirect the action or strike to a character adjacent to the original target.

name: Abundant Step
effect:
Monk only.
React: After an opponent has moved a character into or out of his first rank: Move this character forward or backward one rank.
Spend React: After this character is targeted with a melee or ranged strike: The strike is a critical failure.

name: Ahdi Akkhar
effect:
Dwarf • Warlord • Barbarian • Unique
Your Barbarian Dwarves have Powerattack +10.
React: Once per turn, after an attack in which one of your Dwarves kills an opposing character: One of your Barbarians performs an attack (spending as normal).

name: Altar of the Mind
effect:
Mentalist only.
Spend Order: Target and spend another Mentalist in play of equal or lower level.
React: After this character hits with a melee strike, spend the Altar of the Mind: Spend the target of the melee strike. If the target is already spent, the target's controller must draw and discard 3 cards from the top of his deck.

name: Amoudasi's Fire
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Ethereal
May not attack.
Spend Order: Target a character within one rank. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) or suffer 1 wound.
"When Amoudasi touches Narawat, all that is left is ash." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Amoudasi's Wrath
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Ethereal
May not attack.
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks and perform a skill check (DC = target's printed AC). If successful, the target suffers one wound.

name: Ananasia Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
Order: Equip the Spider Form, ignoring level requirements.
"The coming battle cannot end but with all invaders retreating, lest our war on Bascaron be all the harsher for it." - Yscar the Elder

name: Ancient Feuds
effect:
Mentalist only.
Spend Order: After an opposing character has played a Spend Order or Spend React action card: Cancel the effects of the action card and ready the character.

name: Arcane Attack
effect:
Fighter and wizard only. This is a spell.
Order: Target a character one rank away and perform a magic check (DC = target character's AC). If successful, inflict a wound on the target. If this character is a fighter, add his ATK to the magic check roll. If this character is a wizard, you may target up to two ranks away.

name: Arcane Coordination
effect: Spend React: After a wizard in your army targets another character with a spell producing a ranged strike or DC check: Increase the bonus of the ranged strike or target of the DC check by this character's level.

name: Ardenal
effect:
Dwarf
Ardenal is +1 level for casting Gargoyle-only spells and may cast them as if he were a Gargoyle.
React: Once per turn, when Ardenal is suffering one or more wounds: Reduce the number of wounds suffered by one.

name: Arra'dann
effect:
Nothrog • Monk • VoTaurr
Arra'dann inflicts an additional wound when he hits with a melee strike
React: After Arra'dann inflicts wounds with a melee strike: If the target suffers more wounds than he has hit points, inflict wounds equal to the difference on a character adjacent to the melee strike's target.

name: Attrition
effect:
May not be played by characters over 3rd level.
Order: Target an opposing non-Warlord character with a printed level 6 or highter. Attach Attrition to this character. While this card is attached, this character gains +4 ATK, an additional strike at +0 ATK, +4 AC, +4 skill and +2 HP. Discard this card when the target character leaves play.

name: Badu Lutalo
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Monk • Narawat
React: After an opponent targets Badu with a melee or ranged strike: Roll a die. If this roll is higher than Badu's printed AC, Badu's AC is raised to the roll for the duration of the strike.

name: Bem Kaundodo
effect:
Mercenary • Unique • Narawat Fundisi of Sanaa
Spend React: Before bringing a character into play who is not a Monster, Gargoyle, Dragon, Undead, or Seige character: The character enters play a number of ranks forward equal to the number of different Avatars you have in play.

name: Biall'stal
effect:
Nothrog • VoTaurr
Biall'stal is both a fighter and a wizard. You must discard a card from your hand to bring Biall'stal into play.
React: Once per turn, after Biall'stal kills an opposing character with a melee strike: Perform a +2 ranged strike.

name: Black Sand Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle • Stealth +5
May not equip items.
You must have a cleric in your army to bring Black Sand Gargoyle into play.
Opposing characters in the same rank as Black Sand Gargoyle have -5 ATK, -5 AC, and -5 Skill.

name: Blackwaters Shrine
effect:
Warlord only • Eastern Territory
Spend React: After a character you control kills an opposing character with a ranged strike: If your characters have killed at least three opposing characters with ranged strikes this turn, attach this card to your Warlord. While this card is attached your Warlord has +8 Skill. Discard this card if any other player plays an Eastern Territory.

name: Blackwaters Steed
effect:
Steed • Epic
Order: Up to twice per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Blackwaters Steed: Move a character forward or backward one rank.

name: Blood Spirit
effect:
Elf • Ethereal • Unique
If Blood Spirit is ready, wizard spells cast by Elves in Blood Spirit's formation may be cast as if from Blood Spirit's position.
"So great was the slaughter that Blood sent one of its servants to bask in the mayhem." - Behlial

name: Bodyguard
effect:
AC: (+1)
Familiar
Characters more than 2 ranks away may not target this character with melee or ranged strikes. This character may not target characters more than 2 ranks away with melee or ranged strikes.

name: Braalig
effect:
Nothrog • Monk • Spider Legion
React: Once per turn, after Braalig has performed a successful melee strike: Perform a melee strike.
"The Spider Legion split from Red Wolf rather than use unnatural siege weaponry." - Krun

name: Bracers of Energy
effect:
Gauntlet • Scribe +2
This character has a bonus to his ATK equal to the number of spells scribed.
"Spider came to me in a vision, and showed me an errant child serving with the Free Kingdoms." - Mekk'iah

name: Bracers of Ichaerus
effect:
AC: (+1)
Shield
If this character is a cleric, adjacent characters have +2 AC.
If this character is a fighter, he gainst +2 AC.
React: Spend the Bracers before a melee strike roll targeting this character: If this character is a wizard, the strike is a critical failure.

name: Callenor Tzin
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Mentalist
Monks adjacent to Callenor gain +2 ATK and +2 AC.
When Vronish Kez heard of the armies marching to the desert, he gave Baqbou troops like myself to fight off the attackers.

name: Camel
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend the Camel: Move this character either forward one rank or to another position in this rank.
Order: Once per turn, spend the Camel: Ready an unstunned item of level 5 or less equipped by this character.

name: Carmyn Buran
effect:
Mercenary
React: Once per turn, before Carmyn casts a spell, inflict a wound on an adjacent character: Carmyn gains +3 levels until the end of the turn.
There is no fate.

name: Castus the Burning
effect:
Deverenian • Myerdeth
Any time Castus inflicts a wound with a spell, he inflicts an additional wound.
Hail to thee, Baruuk. I bring thee thy new orders…

name: Cavalry Charge
effect:
Fighter and rogue only.
Order: Spend a Steed equipped by this character: This character performs a Riding check (DC 20). If successful, ready this character. This character may not attack or play a copy of Cavalry Charge again this turn.

name: Chaos
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
React: After one of your Dwarf Barbarians is killed: Move Chaos forward one rank. You may use this ability while Chaos is stunned.
Whatever called us here changed us. We are not as we once were.

name: Chioke Addo
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Mentalist • Narawat
Order: If your Warlord is Free Kingdoms, perform a teleportation check (DC 15). If successful, move Chioke forward any number of ranks. Otherwise, Chioke is killed.

name: Ciane
effect:
Elf • Nimbic
React: Before Ciane makes a melee strike roll: Ciane gains +5 ATK for the strike and inflicts an additional wound if he hits. Inflict a wound on Ciane after the strike resolves.

name: Cornering the Mark
effect: Order: Target an opposing stunned character in an opponent's front rank, up to two ranks away. Move this rogue to your front rank and perform a melee strike against the target. If the strike hits, you may immediately perform another Order.

name: Crown of Amber
effect:
Helm
Mentalists with the Crown of Amber equipped gain +4 Skill. This character gains an additional +2 Skill during Will saves and checks. This character may perform one action per turn as if he were a Mentalist.

name: Cutpurse
effect:
Fighter and rogue only.
Spend Order: Targeta character within two ranks and perform a Stealth check (DC = 5 + target's Skill): If successful and this character is a fighter, perform a melee strike against the target. If successful and this character is a rogue, discard an item from the target.

name: Dallen Stormlost
effect:
Deverenian • Warlord • Unique
Seer • Magic Resistance +7
Dallen is both a cleric and a fighter, and enters play as if he were level 5.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand: Remove one wound from Dallen.
Order: Once per turn: Target an opposing player. The target must shuffle his hand into his deck and draw 4 cards.

name: Dallen's Aid
effect:
Cleric and fighter only. This is a spell.
React: Before another character in this rank makes a melee strike roll: If this character is a cleric, add half this character's Skill (round down) to the strike. If this character is a fighter, add half this character's ATK (round down) to the strike.

name: Darsan
effect:
Mercenary • Monk
When Darsan hits with a melee strike he inflicts a number of wounds equal to the target's level minus 1.
"I left the NoThRoG because they never respected me. Now they pay me a hundred golden talons for every soul I send to the ether."

name: Dazzling Stance
effect:
Mentalist or Monk only.
Spend Order: Target a character in an adjacent rank who must succeed with a Will save (DC 14) or be stunned.

name: Deathly Fatigue
effect: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, any character that becomes ready due to its controller's card effects suffers one wound.

name: Deverenian Scout
effect:
Deverenian • Scout
If any opposing Warlord is a cleric or wizard, Deverenian Scout has +2 HP and Stealth +10.

name: Devotion
effect:
Dwarf
React: After a Dwarf one rank ahead of Devotion is killed, causing an illegal rank: Move Devotion forward one rank before correcting the illegal rank.

name: Divine Inspiration
effect:
Cleric and fighter only. This is a spell.
Order: Make a Charisma check (DC 17): If successful and this character is a cleric, target a character you control who gains +4 ATK and +4 AC until the end of the turn. If successful and this character is a fighter, until the end of the turn characters adjacent to the fighter gain +4 ATK and +4 AC.

name: Doomedsky Steed
effect:
Steed • Epic
Order: Up to twice per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Doomedsky Steed: Target a character within one rank. The target performs a melee strike.

name: Door to the World
effect:
Dwarf • Siege • Unique
May not perform actions other than the following:
Spend React: After one or more wounds are inflicted on a Dwarf: Reduce the number of wounds by one.

name: Dragonkin
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, before falling forward: Do not spend or stun when falling forward.
Spend Order: Target one or two characters within two ranks and adjacent to each other. Perform a +3 ranged strike against each, in any order.

name: Duard
effect:
Deverenian • Monk • Unique
React: Once per turn, before Duard rolls a melee strike: If Duard hits, the strike inflicts a number of wounds equal to the number of cards in the target's controller's hand.

name: Dusk Spirit
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
React: After the Dusk Spirit is targeted with a melee strike: Roll a die. The attacker must succeed with a Wisdom save (DC = Dusk Spirit's Skill + die roll) or suffer one wound.

name: Easy Target
effect:
Order: Target a stunned character within one rank: Perform a melee strike against the target that inflicts an number of additional wounds equal to this Rogue's level.
"The Narawati believed their homelands impervious to assault, but the VoTaurr knew better." - Vronish Kez

name: Elena
effect:
Deverenian • Mentalist
Spend Order: Target an opposing lower-level character in an adjacent rank. Inflict a number of wounds on the target equal to the number of cards in target's controller's hand minus 4.

name: Endless Bloodshed
effect: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all fighters in play have the ability "Order: Once per turn, stun this character: Perform an attack without spending."

name: Energy Arrow
effect:
Rogue and wizard only. This is a spell.
React: After this character chooses the target of a ranged strike: Make a marksmanship check (DC 20). If successful and this character is a rogue, the target is considered stunned for the duration of the ranged strike (overriding other card effects). If successful and this character is a wizard, spend the target.

name: Energy Bow
effect:
Bow
Rogue and Wizard only.
If this character is a rogue, he gains Marksmanship +5.
Order: Once per turn: If this character is a wizard, perform a +4 ranged strike.

name: Esopa
effect:
Elf • Mentalist • Nimbic
React: Once per turn, after Esopa rolls a die: Reroll the die.
We lost little this day, and gained much indeed…. Tell me, did the Deverenians' victory' grace them half as well?

name: Everyman's Amulet
effect: Rogues with Everyman's Amulet equipped gain +3 AC. Wizards with Everyman's Amulet equipped gain +5 Skill. Fighters with Everyman's Amulet equipped gain +3 ATK. Clerics with Everyman's Amulet equipped gain +1 hit point. If this character receives stat bonuses from other items, the Amulet's bonus to that stat is negated.

name: Fatima
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Mentalist • Isadran
Order: Kill Fatima: Kill a lower-level non-Warlord Mentalist or Monk up to 3 ranks away.
I always warn them not to fall in love. They never listen.

name: Flawless Motion
effect:
Monk only.
React: After any character has performed an Order: This character attacks (spending as usual).
"My people have dwelled in this Storm-forsaken deathtrap for too long. Our patience is at its end." - Duard

name: Flesh and Bone
effect:
Spend React: After a stunned character falls forward: Discard all cards in the character's controller's hand.
"The nimbics are everything an elf craves and fears. They are greater than us in nearly every way, but for a mere decade of life." - Ichaerus

name: Gand Wyrian
effect:
Mercenary • Monk • Unique
Spend React: Once per game, before Gand is killed, stun Gand: Remove all wounds from Gand and place him in the rank behind your last occupied rank. Gand gains +2 levels, +4 AC, +1 HP and +7 skill until the end of the game. You may not use this ability if you have no cards in your hand.

name: Ger'rog
effect:
Mercenary • Monk • Defend +0
React: Once per turn, after a character adjacent to Ger'rog is targeted with a melee strike: Inflict a wound on Ger'rog to cancel that strike.
"The VoTaurr did not flinch as they faced the sole NoThRoG that opposed them, but neither did he." - Ananasia Yscar

name: Halo of Fire
effect:
Mercenary • Seige • Unique
May not perform actions other than the following:
Spend React: After a Mercenary inflicts one or more wounds with an action (not a melee strike): Increase the number of wounds inflicted by one.

name: Halo of Secrets
effect:
Deverenian • Seige • Unique
May not perform actions other than the following:
Spend React: After a Deverenian is targeted by an action (not a melee strike): Cancel the action.

name: Halt
effect: Spend React: After a character within one rank is targeted with a melee strike: Cancel the strike.

name: Healing Meditation
effect:
Monk or Mentalist only.
Spend Order: Remove all wounds from this character. You may immediately perform another Order.

name: Helm of the Djinn
effect:
Helm
If this character is a cleric he has +4 Skill.
If this character is a rogue he has +2 AC.
Order: Spend the Helm: If this character is a wizard, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Hippal
effect:
Elf • Nimbic
Ranged strikes performed by characters in this rank get +2 to the die roll.

name: Hold The Line!
effect: Order: Spend all of your characters in your front rank: Until the end of the turn, all characters entering your front rank or brought into your front rank become spent. In addition, until the end of the turn, all characters in your front rank gain +6 AC.

name: Horishunn
effect:
Nothrog • Monk • Spider Legion
Spend React: After Horishunn moves to your front rank: Perform an attack without spending.
Ours is the way of natural law. Think as men, kill as beasts.

name: Hurr'aal
effect:
Nothrog • VoTaurr
Hurr'aal is both a fighter and a wizard. You must discard a card from your hand to bring Hurr'aal into play.
React: Once per turn, after Hurr'aal casts a spell: Move Hurr'aal forward one rank.

name: Hymn
effect:
Dwarf
Spend React: After one of your level 1 Dwarves is targeted with a melee strike: All of your level 1 Dwarves gain +2 ATK and +2 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Ibn al-Xuffasch
effect:
Deverenian • Mentalist • Isadran
Order: Once per turn: Target a character in this or an adjacent rank. The target character's alignment is changed to the opposite of its current alignment until the end of the turn.

name: Ill-Gotten Gains
effect:
Cleric and rogue only. This is a spell.
React: After an opposing character performs an action to draw or retrieve a card from the deck: Spend the target. If this character is a cleric, the target has -3 AC and -3 ATK until the end of the turn. If this character is a rogue, perform a melee strike against the target.

name: Infinity's End
effect:
React: After a character uses an ability of action card that the character has already used this turn: The character suffers 2 wounds.
React: After an opposing character performs an action to draw or retrieve a card from the deck: Target the character's controller. If the player has fewer than 10 cards in his deck, discard the deck.

name: Inner Spirit Bracers
effect:
Gauntlet • Monk only.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: Once per turn before this character makes a melee or ranged strike roll or skill check, spend the Bracers: This character gains a bonus to the die roll equal to the number of cards in your hand.

name: Inspired Aim
effect:
Cleric and rogue only. This is a spell.
React: Before this character makes a ranged strike roll: If this character is a cleric and the target is of the opposite alignment, the ranged strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits. If this character is a rogue, perform a Marksmanship check (DC 15). If successful, add this character's level to the ranged strike roll.

name: Isadran Assault
effect:
Spend Order: Move all of your ready rogues in your second rank forward one rank, in any order.
"Knowledge and secrecy are all-important. Assassins must not merely be silent, they must be scholars as well." - Baruuk

name: Isadran Library
effect:
Warlord only • Southern Territory
Spend React: After a character you control reduces, redirects, or removes a wound: If your characters have reduced, redirected, and/or removes at least three wounds this turn, attach this card to your Warlord. While this card is attached your Warlord has +1 HP. Discard this card if any player plays a Southern Territory.

name: Isadran Mail
effect:
Armor • Gauntlet • Helm • Unique
Order: Discard Isadran Mail: Remove all wounds from this character.

name: Isadran Treachery
effect:
Cleric and wizard only. This is a spell.
After this character is targeted with a melee strike: Gain +2 AC for the duration of the strike. If this character is a cleric, gain an additional +2 AC until the end of the turn. If this character is a wizard, perform a melee strike targeting the attacking character after the strike resolves.

name: Jianna
effect:
Elf
Spend React: After another player brings a character into play, if that player has brought 2 or more characters into play this turn: Until the end of the turn, all characters enter play spent.

name: Kab'balos
effect:
Nothrog • VoTaurr
Spend React: Before fixing an illegal rank: If your Warlord is a NoThRoG, move Bak'balos into the rank in front of the illegal rank.
"He is small and weak for a VoTaurr, just as a single stormcrow is but a tiny portion of the all-devouring Storm." - Sceth Hellbringer

name: Kama
effect:
Weapon • Monk only
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand: This character has -2 ATK until the end of the turn. Perform a melee strike.
"Think of the enemy as sheaves of overripe wheat while they live, and mourn them as lost souls when they die." - Kun Davill

name: Kato Lembua
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Monk • Narawat
React: After Kato kills an opposing character with a melee strike: Kato gains +3 ATK until the end of the turn.

name: Kedric
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Warlord • Monk • Mentalist • Unique
May use level 1, 2, and 3 Fighter actions.
React: After an opposing character performs an action to draw a card: Perform a melee strike.
"A lonely wonderer from the north, and a great pupil of the haval-lahn." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Kun Amulet
effect:
AC: (+1) Sk: (+2)
Monk only.
+2 skill.
Order: Spend the Kun Amulet: Look at the top card of any deck.
"We train not to react to an enemy, but to predict him" - Kun Hull

name: Kun Tzin
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: Once per turn, after Kun Tzin performs a successful melee strike: Perform a melee strike.
"Llyr, lend Narawat aid, that the desert people might join the Free Kingdoms." - Vronish Kez

name: Lady Eryne
effect:
Deverenian • Mentalist
Spend Order: Target a character within one rank. The target must succeed with a fear save (DC 10 + Lady Eryne's skill) or be moved back two ranks.

name: Longbow of Fire
effect:
Bow
If this character is a rogue, he gains Marksmanship +5.
Spend Order: If this character is a fighter, perform a +5 ranged strike.
React: Once per turn before making a ranged strike roll: If this character is a wizard, spend the target if the ranged strike hits.

name: Loravon
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Kill Loravon: Target all characters in an adjacent rank. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 12) or suffer one wound.

name: Mekk'iah
effect:
Nothrog • Warlord • Unique • VoTaurr
Mekk'iah is both a fighter and a wizard.
We have never forgotten the prophecy, but we have rarely come close to fulfilling it… until now.

name: Mkono-Djarat
effect:
Weapon
If this character is a fighter, he may perform an additional strike (+4 ATK) whenever he performs an attack. If this character is a rogue, he gainst Riposte +3
React: Once per turn, after inflicting wounds with a melee strike: If this character is a cleric remove one wound from him.

name: Morale
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
Lower-level Dwarves in the same rank as one or more Morales inflict an additional wound when they hit with a melee strike.
There is no change. There is only the soul, and its destiny.

name: Mothusi Rahsaan
effect:
Mercenary • Narawat • Havat-lahn
May not equip Armor.
Mothusi Rahsaan ignores class and trait requirements when equipping Weapons.
React: Before equipping a Weapon, discard an equipped Weapon: Mothusi gains +2 levels for equipping the new Weapon.

name: Mystic Strike
effect:
Fighter and wizard only. This is a spell.
React: Before this character makes a melee strike roll: If this character is a fighter, gain an ATK bonus equal to twice this character's level. If this character is a wizard and the strike hits, spend the target.

name: Narawat Banner
effect:
Charisma +3.
This fighter may use the Charisma feat one extra time per turn.

name: Negotiated Surrender
effect:
Warlord only.
If your opponents have no cards in their decks and your total number of Monks and Mentalists in your front rank exceeds the number of characters in each opposing front rank, you win the game.

name: Nimbic Mace
effect:
Weapon
If this character is a cleric, adjacent characters have +3 ATK.
If this character is a fighter, he has+3 ATK (+4 total).
"The nimbics rarely work with necromancers, but never lost their tast for bone weapons." - Ichaerus

name: No Prisoners!
effect: React: After performing a melee strike that killed its target: Perform a melee strike targeting any characters that were adjacent to the original target, with a -3 ATK penalty to each strike.

name: Nothrog Hoodlum
effect:
Nothrog
If he has a Weapon equipped, NoThRoG Hoodlum gains +3 ATK, +3 AC, +3 skill and +1 HP.
"When tradition falls to blind ambition, the general's failings spread to his entire legion." - Sav'rukk

name: Oasis Shrine
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Siege • Unique
May not perform actions other than the following:
Spend React: After a Free Kingdoms character performs the last melee strike during an attack: That character performs a melee strike.

name: Okpara Lembua
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Monk • Unique
Narawat • Okpara may remain spent during the ready phase.
Spend Order: If your Warlord is Free Kingdoms: While Okpara remains spent (not stunned) and in play, your hand size is increased by 1.

name: Paying the Price
effect:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: After killing an opposing character with a melee strike: Perform another melee strike with the same base ATK targeting an opposing spent character. If this character is a fighter, add +5 to the strike. If this character is a rogue, the strike inflicts an extra wound.

name: Perfect Self
effect:
Monk or Mentalist only.
Order: Until the end of the next turn, this character may not be targeted with melee strikes by a character without a Weaponof level 8 or higher equipped, and may not be targeted with ranged strikes by a character without a Bow or level 8 or higher equipped.

name: Plague Rot
effect: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, after any character performs a Spend Order or Spend React, that character suffers one wound. Until the end of the turn, all clerics have the ability "React: When Plague Rot inflicts a wound on a character in this army, spend this cleric: Reduce the wounds to zero."

name: Playful Efreet
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Ethereal
When making a melee strike, Playful Efreet misses if the roll is odd.
Playful Efreet ignores the Astral trait when making melee strikes.

name: Purity of Light
effect:
Cleric and wizard only. This is a spell.
Order: Target a character of opposite alignment up to two ranks away who must perform a magic save (DC 10 + this character's skill). If unsuccessful and this character is a cleric, stun the target. If unsuccessful and this character is a wizard, inflict one wound on the target.

name: Qadlin
effect:
Elf • Mentalist
Order: Discard a card from your hand: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
Saunginel's agent did not trust the Dominar's advice. He cares nothing for the temples, only for conscripting the people of the desert.

name: Quilian Adinerach
effect:
Elf
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand: Retrieve a 1st level wizard spell from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand.

name: Ranged Ambush
effect: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all of your fighters and rogues in your second rank with an ability that generates a ranged strike have the ability "Spend Order: After an opposing character moves into his or her army's front rank: perform a +X ranged strike targeting that character. X equals this character's level."

name: Raziel
effect:
Elf • Warlord • Mentalist • Unique • Nimbic
While Raziel is in play your characters may not perform actions to draw cards.
Order: Discard a card and target a player: Discard a random card from the target's hand.
Spend Order: Once per turn, target an opposing non-Warlord character: Until the end of the turn, the target's text box is considered blank.

name: Razzlin's Staff
effect:
Weapon • Cursed
React: Spend and stun Razzlin's Staff after this character kills an opposing character with a spell: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a wizard spell you may add it to your hand. If not, discard it and stun this character.

name: Recruiter's Orders
effect: Order: Once per turn: Take a card from the top of your deck and put it into play in your front rank face down as a level 1 fighter with +1 ATK, 9 AC, +0 skill, 1 HP, and the same alignment as your Warlord. If at any time you have no Recruiter's Orders in play, all of your characters put into play with this ability are killed.

name: Regina Tremayne
effect:
Deverenian • Assassin
Order: Spend a Weapon equipped by Regina: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the Weapon's ATK bonus (minimum +0).
Try not to bleed all over the shipment.

name: Repel
effect: Spend Order: Target all opposing characters within one rank of opposite alignment and equal or lower level. Move all targets back one rank, in any order.

name: Ring of Movement
effect: Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand: Perform a melee strike. You may only target a character whose controller has more cards in his hand than you do. This action may be canceled by the target's controller by discarding any number of cards from his or her hand until he holds no more cards than you do.

name: Ring of Smiting
effect:
Fighter and wizard only.
If this character is a fighter, he has +2 ATK.
If this character is a wizard, melee strikes this character performs ignore the effects of the Astral and Ethereal traits.

name: Rollen Watts
effect:
Mercenary • Assassin • Scout
React: After another character has performed an action to draw or retrieve cards or forced you to discard cards, kill Rollen: Cancel the action and inflict 1 wound on the character performing the action.

name: Rondoran's Staff
effect:
Weapon
Spend Order: Spend and stun Rondoran's Staff: If this character is in your front rank, remove one wound from all characters within one rank.

name: Rough Road
effect: Spend React: After an opposing character has moved forward without spending: Spend that character. If that character is already spent, stun that character.

name: Sandman's Ring
effect:
Unique • Cleric and wizard only.
Spend Order: Stun this character: Target a number of opposing characters up to this character's level within 2 ranks. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15, DC 20 if this character is a cleric) or become spent. If this character is a wizard, spent characters who fail become stunned.

name: Sar'ean
effect:
Nothrog • Unique • VoTaurr
Spend Order: Target one of your ready NoThRoGs in the fifth rank or higher. The NoThRoG attacks, only targeting characters in opposing last ranks. Until the end of the turn, characters in opposing last ranks may target the NoThRoG with melee strikes as if in an adjacent rank.

name: Sel'leana
effect:
Mercenary • Paladin
Sel'leana may play level 1 and 2 cleric and wizard actions.
"My people are wrong to serve the NoThRoG. We only serve justice."

name: Seraphina Foluke
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend React: After a player declares a pass that ends the turn: If you have exactly five cards in hand, draw 2 cards.
"A cousin to Sanaa's fundisi, Seraphina serves the goddess less by worship than by insipiration." - Baqbou Umbala

name: Shadow Bolts
effect:
Rogue and wizard only. This is a spell.
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike. If this character is a rogue, this ranged strike deals an additional wound to spent characters. If this character is a wizard, perform a second +4 ranged strike after the first resolves.

name: Shatter Steel
effect:
Monk only.
React: Before rolling a melee strike against an opposing character: Discard an item equipped by the opposing character.
"I warned you that I intended to fight you as an equal." - Duard

name: Shatteredplains Steed
effect:
Steed • Epic
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Spend Order: Ready a lower level character.
Spend Order: If you have the Doomedsky, Shatteredplains, and Blackwaters Steeds in the first rank, spend all three: Shuffle one or more cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Shatteredplains Tomb
effect:
Warlord only • Western Territory
Spend React: After a character you control kills an opposing character with a melee strike: If your characters have killed at least four opposing characters with melee strikes this turn, attach this card to your Warlord. While this card is attached, your Warlord has +5 ATK. Discard this card if any player plays a Western Territory.

name: Shomari Jawara
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Paladin • Narawat • Fundisi of Kinyamkela
Shomari may not target good characters with melee or ranged strikes. Good characters of equal or lower level may not target Shomari with melee or ranged strikes.

name: Sir Edgar Ghenis
effect:
Deverenian • Ghenis • Tremayne
React: Once per turn, target an opposing character after he enters or moves to an adjacent rank: Reveal your hand to your opponents. If you do not have any character cards in your hand, Sir Edget may perform a melee strike against the target.

name: Skiall
effect:
Nothrog • Seer
React: Once per turn, after you pass: Give a character within one rank an ATK and AC bonus equal to Skiall's level until the end of the turn.
When the four temples unite as one, the world changes forever.

name: Spear Cache
effect:
Weapon • Bow • Warlord only.
Spend Order: Discard Spear Cache: Until the end of the turn characters in your army have the ability "Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike."
Spend Order: Perform three consecutive +1 ranged strikes.

name: Spider Vestments
effect:
AC: (+2)
Armor
Cleric and rogue only.
If this character is a cleric, he has +3 Skill.
If this character is a rogue, he gainst Stealth +5.

name: Spiked Shield
effect:
AC: (+2)
Shield
Fighter and rogue only.
If this character is a fighter, he gains an extra melee strike (ATK +1) whenever he performs an attack.
If this character is a rogue, he gains Riposte +5.

name: Suffering
effect:
Dwarf • Mentalist
Spend Order: Inflict a wound on Suffering: Remove one wound from an adjacent character.
Spend Order: Remove one wound from Suffering.

name: Talon
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
React: After Talon wounds another character with a melee strike, kill Talon: Inflict an additional wound on the target of the melee strike.
Something happened after Ironhall fell. The caves opened up to the World Above.

name: Tarrell Adinerach
effect:
Elf
React: Before Tarrell casts a spell: Increase his level for casting the spell by 1. After the spell resolves, inflict one wound on Tarrell.
The nimbics are the results of vile Wyrian experiments. They are part elf, and part… something greater.

name: Temb'w'bam
effect:
Nothrog
React: After Temb'w'bam moves during an action he performed: Perform a +2 ranged strike. This strike may not receive any further bonuses or modifications to the roll.
Suffer and burn, fools.

name: Temple of the Doomed Sky
effect:
Warlord only • Northern Territory
Spend React: After a character you control kills an oppsoing spent or stunned character: If your characters have killed at least three opposing spent or stunned characters this turn, attach this card to your Warlord. While this card is attached your Warlord has +4 AC. Discard this card if any player plays a Northern Territory.

name: Thatch
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
Thatch inflicts an additional wound when he hits with a melee strike if the target's controller does not have any cards in his hand, or has not played a card from his hand this turn.

name: The Martyr's Helm
effect:
Helm • Unique • Stealth +4
Order: Kill this character: If this character is in another army's formation, and if you have more cards in your hand than that opponent, he discards his hand.

name: The Stone Spider
effect:
Nothrog • Monk • VoTaurr
React: After the Stone Spider suffers more than 1 wound from a melee strike: Reduce the wounds to 1.

name: Thought and Action
effect:
Mentalist only.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike with a bonus to the roll equal to this character's skill.
Spend Order: Discard an item equipped by a character up to two ranks away.

name: Timeless Body
effect:
Monk or Mentalist only.
Spend Order: Stun this character: If you have no cards in your hand, this turn ends immediately.
“The ritual's completion changed all at hand forever, bestowing gifts of the mind." - Will

name: Unstoppable
effect:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: Before this character inflicts wounds with a melee strike: The wounds may not be reduced or redirected.
React: Before this character moves forward: Opposing characters may not React to the move or to the entering of a new rank.

name: Vae Victus!
effect:
Spend Order: All stunned characters suffer one wound.
"The VoTaurr were all but spent from the battles when a new army marched upon them. Though the VoTaurr turned back the Dwarves, the effort itself slew nearly as many soldiers as did the Dwarves."

name: Vantage Point
effect:
Non-Warlord only.
Order: Until the end of the turn, this rogue may not be targeted by actions or strikes. This character may not perform any actions until the end of the turn. If this character is a Scout, he may still perform actions that produce ranged strikes.

name: Varson Yscar
effect: Mercenary • Warlord • Lycanthrope • Unique • Scribe +7 • Varson is both a cleric and a rogue, and enters play as if he were level 5. Your Lycanthrope characters suffer no loyalty penalty. Varson may have Lycanthropes from other factions in his starting army. Varson may use the Scribe feat with Rogue actions. Varson has +1 level for equipping items.

name: VoTaurr Plains
effect:
Nothrog • Seige • Unique
May not perform actions other than the following:
Spend React: After a NoThRoG in your army moves forward or backward: Move the NoThRoG one rank in the same direction.

name: Watchful
effect:
Dwarf
React: Once per turn, after an adjacent Dwarf suffers a wound: Ready Watchful.
We survived Ironhall only to find new horrors awating us above. Whatever the Deverenians had done to us marked us forever.

name: Will
effect:
Dwarf • Mentalist
Spend Order: Target up to two opposing characters up to two ranks away. Each target must succeed with a will save (DC 11) or become stunned.
Use power wisely, or not at all. A loss to greed is a loss to the Abyss.

name: Wyrian's Blood
effect:
Elf • Seige • Unique
May not perform actions other than the following:
Spend React: After an Elf is killed: Shuffle that Elf back into the deck instead of sending it to the discard pile.

name: Xiola
effect:
Elf • Mentalist • House Netheryn
Spend Order: Target all items equipped by a stunned character in an adjacent rank: The items are discarded.
Saunginel's undead marched side-by-side with our nimbic troops, a small favor from Ichaerus to the necromancer.

name: Yarr
effect:
Elf • Mentalist
React: Immediately before Yarr is killed by an opponent's melee strike or action, target another player: Draw and discard the top 2 cards of that player's deck.
There is a price in every death, Deverenian, and you bartered yourself poorly.

name: Zagreb Umbala
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Narawat
React: After Zagreb performs an attack: Perform a melee strike targeting a spent character within one rank.
"Quit your whining, Jonah. You've had worse."

name: Zaina
effect:
Deverenian • Assassin • Stealth +5 • Isadran
React: After an opposing character targets Zaina with an action (not a melee strike): Perform a melee strike.
When faced with darkness, fools fear and the wise serve. So it is with Baruuk.
